          class AcquisitionCategoriesController < ApplicationController
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1

          1

            def new
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          2
          
              authorize! :manage_acquisition_categories, AcquisitionCategory
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          2
          
              set_page_title I18n.t (:acquisition_category)

    29. 
          2
          
              @acquisition_category = AcquisitionCategory.new

            def edit
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              authorize! :manage_acquisition_categories, AcquisitionCategory
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
              set_page_title I18n.t (:acquisition_category)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
              @acquisition_category = AcquisitionCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
              unless @acquisition_category.child_reference.nil?
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                if @acquisition_category.child_reference.is_proposed_or_custom?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_acquisition_category_cannot_be_updated)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => "tabs-4"))
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              end

          1
          
            def create
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
              authorize! :manage_acquisition_categories, AcquisitionCategory
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
              @acquisition_category = AcquisitionCategory.new(params[:acquisition_category])
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
              if @acquisition_category.save
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_acquisition_category_successful_created)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => "tabs-4"))
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              else
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                render action: "edit"
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
            end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
              authorize! :manage_acquisition_categories, AcquisitionCategory
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
              @acquisition_category = nil
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
              current_acquisition_category = AcquisitionCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
              if current_acquisition_category.record_status == @defined_status
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                @acquisition_category = current_acquisition_category.amoeba_dup
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                @acquisition_category.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              else
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                @acquisition_category = current_acquisition_category
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
              if @acquisition_category.update_attributes(params[:acquisition_category])
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_acquisition_category_successful_updated)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                #redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => "tabs-4"))
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect("/projects_global_params#tabs-4")
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              else
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                render action: "edit"
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
              authorize! :manage_acquisition_categories, AcquisitionCategory
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
              @acquisition_category = AcquisitionCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
              if @acquisition_category.is_defined? || @acquisition_category.is_custom?
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on Defined record
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                @acquisition_category.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              else
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                #physical deletion when record is not defined
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                @acquisition_category.destroy
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_acquisition_category_successful_destroyed)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
              redirect_to projects_global_params_path(:anchor => "tabs-4")
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
            end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          end

            def destroy
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
              @admin_setting = AdminSetting.find(params[:id])

      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
              if is_master_instance?

                if @admin_setting.is_defined? || @admin_setting.is_custom?

    96.

      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  @admin_setting.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)

    98. 
          
          
                  flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_administration_setting_successful_deleted)

    99.

      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  @admin_setting.destroy
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_administration_setting_successful_deleted)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                #if in local instance
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              else
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                if @admin_setting.is_local_record?
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  @admin_setting.destroy
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_administration_setting_successful_deleted)
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                else
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_masterdata_record_cant_delete)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
              end
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
              redirect_to admin_settings_path
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
            end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
            def admin_setting_selected_status
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              begin
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                selected = nil
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                @admin_setting = AdminSetting.find(params[:id])  unless params[:id].nil?
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                if is_master_instance?
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  if @admin_setting.record_status.nil?  || @admin_setting.is_defined?
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                    selected = @proposed_status
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  else
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    selected = @admin_setting.record_status
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                  end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                else
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  if  @admin_setting.record_status.nil? || @admin_setting.is_local_record?
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    selected = @local_status
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  else
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                    selected = @admin_setting.record_status
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                selected
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                nil
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
            end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
          
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
            def unselect_conditions
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              (@admin_setting.is_retired? || !is_master_instance?) ? "#{I18n.t (:unselectable)}" : ''
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
            end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148.

            def set_locale_from_browser
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          79
          
                if  request.env['HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE'].nil?
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          79
          
                  I18n.locale= "en"
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                else
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  local_langage=Language.find_by_locale(extract_locale_from_accept_language_header)
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                  if local_langage.nil?
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                    I18n.locale= "en"
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                  else
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                    I18n.locale = extract_locale_from_accept_language_header
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                  end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
            end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
            private
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
            def extract_locale_from_accept_language_header
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              request.env['HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE'].scan(/^[a-z]{2}/).first
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
            end

          class AttributeModulesController < ApplicationController
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
            include DataValidationHelper #Module for master data changes validation
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
            before_filter :get_record_statuses
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              @attribute_module = AttributeModule.new(params[:attribute_module])
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                if @attribute_module.save
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  redirect_to attribute_modules_path, notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_attribute_module_successful_created)}"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                else
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  render action: "new"
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              @attribute_module = AttributeModule.find(params[:id])
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              if @attribute_module.is_defined? || @attribute_module.is_custom?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                @attribute_module.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              else
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                @attribute_module.destroy
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              redirect_to attribute_modules_url
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
            end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          end

              authorize! :manage_attributes, Attribute

    54. 
          
          
              @attribute = Attribute.new(params[:attribute])

            def update
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
              set_page_title "Attributes"
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
              authorize! :manage_attributes, Attribute
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
              @attribute = nil
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
              current_attribute = Attribute.find(params[:id])
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
              if current_attribute.is_defined?
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                @attribute = current_attribute.amoeba_dup
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                @attribute.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              else
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                @attribute = current_attribute
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
              if @attribute.update_attributes(params[:attribute])
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                if @attribute.update_attribute("options", params[:options])
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  @attribute.attr_type = params[:options][0]
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  if @attribute.save
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                    redirect_to redirect(attributes_path)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                  else
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    render action: "edit"
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                else
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  render action: "edit"
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                end
        
      88.

      89.

      91.

      92.

      93.

          1
          
            def destroy
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          2
          
              authorize! :manage_attributes, Attribute
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          2
          
              @attribute = Attribute.find(params[:id])
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          2
          
              if @attribute.is_defined? || @attribute.is_custom?
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on defined record
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                @attribute.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              else
        
      100.

          2
          
                @attribute.destroy
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
          
        
      103.

    104. 
          
          
            end

            def edit

    32. 
          1
          
              @auth_method = AuthMethod.find(params[:id])

          1

      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
              if is_master_instance?

    36. 
          
          
                unless @auth_method.child_reference.nil?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  if @auth_method.child_reference.is_proposed_or_custom?
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_auth_method_cant_be_edit)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    redirect_to auth_methods_path and return
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42.

      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1

    45.

    46.

            def destroy
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
              @auth_method = AuthMethod.find(params[:id])
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                if @auth_method.is_defined? || @auth_method.is_custom?
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                  #logical deletion  delete don't have to suppress records anymore on Defined record
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                  @auth_method.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                else
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  @auth_method.destroy
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
              else
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                if @auth_method.is_local_record? || @auth_method.is_retired?
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                  @auth_method.destroy
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                else
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_master_record_cant_be_delete)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(auth_methods_path)  and return
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to auth_methods_url, notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_auth_method_successful_deleted)}"}
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
            end

            def edit
        
      45.

              authorize! :manage_currency, Currency

              @currency = Currency.find(params[:id])

    50. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_currency_cant_be_edit)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  redirect_to currencies_path
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
            end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
            # POST /currencies
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
            # POST /currencies.json
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_currency, Currency
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              @currency = Currency.new(params[:currency])
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              @currency.save
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              redirect_to redirect(currencies_url)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
            end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            # PUT /currencies/1
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
            # PUT /currencies/1.json
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_currency, Currency
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              @currency = nil
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              current_currency = Currency.find(params[:id])
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              if current_currency.is_defined?
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                @currency = current_currency.amoeba_dup
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                @currency.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              else
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                @currency = current_currency
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              end
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              if @currency.update_attributes(params[:currency])
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(currencies_url), notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_currency_successful_updated)}"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              else
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
            # DELETE /currencies/1
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
            # DELETE /currencies/1.json
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_currency, Currency
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              @currency = Currency.find(params[:id])
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              if @currency.is_defined? || @currency.is_custom?
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on defined record
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                @currency.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              else
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                @currency.destroy
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_currency_successful_deleted)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              redirect_to currencies_url
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
            end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          end

          1

          1
          
              @projects = Project.all

      53.

          1
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                @enable_update_in_local = true
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                unless @group.child_reference.nil?
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  if @group.child_reference.is_proposed_or_custom?
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_group_cant_be_edit)
        
      58.

      59.

      60.

      61.

          1

      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                  @group.record_status = @local_status
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                  @enable_update_in_local = true
        
      65. 
      
        
    65.

            def create
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              authorize! :edit_groups, Group
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              @users = User.all
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              @projects = Project.all
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              @group = Group.new(params[:group])
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              @enable_update_in_local = true
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              #If we are on local instance, Status is set to "Local"
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                @group.record_status = @proposed_status
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              else
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                @group.record_status = @local_status
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              if @group.save
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(groups_path)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              else
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
            end
        
      94.

          1
          
            def update
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              @users = User.all
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              @projects = Project.all
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              @group = nil
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              current_group = Group.find(params[:id])
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              if current_group.is_defined? && is_master_instance?
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                @enable_update_in_local = true
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                @group = current_group.amoeba_dup
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                @group.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              else
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                @group = current_group
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
              unless is_master_instance?
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                if @group.is_local_record?
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  @enable_update_in_local = true
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  @group.custom_value = 'Locally edited'
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                else
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                  @enable_update_in_local = false
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
              end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              if @group.update_attributes(params[:group])
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(groups_path)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              else
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
            end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              @group = Group.find(params[:id])
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                if @group.is_defined? || @group.is_custom?
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on defined record
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  @group.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                else
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  @group.destroy
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              else
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                if @group.is_local_record? || @group.is_retired?
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                  @group.destroy
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                else
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                  flash[:error] = I18n.t (:warning_master_record_cant_be_delete)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(groups_path)  and return
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_group_successful_deleted)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              redirect_to groups_url
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
            end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
            def enable_update_in_local?
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                true
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              else
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                if params[:action] == 'new'
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  true
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                elsif params[:action] == 'edit'
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  @group = Group.find(params[:id])
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  if @group.is_local_record?
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                    true
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                  else
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                    if params[:anchor] == 'tabs-1'
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                      false
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                    end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                  end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
            end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
            def associated_users
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              @group = Group.find(params[:id])
        
      170.

            end
        
      171.

            def associated_projects
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              @group = Group.find(params[:id])
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
            end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
            def user_organizations_users
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
              users = []
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              organizations = current_user.organizations
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              organizations.each do |org|
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                users = users + org.users
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
              users
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
            end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
            def user_organizations_projects
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
              projects = []
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              organizations = current_user.organizations
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              organizations.each do |org|
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                projects = projects + org.projects
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              end
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              projects
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          end

          class HomesController < ApplicationController

            def update_install
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          2
          
              begin
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          2
          
                expire_fragment('about_page')
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          2
          
                if is_master_instance?
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_cant_update_yourself)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  redirect_to '/about' and return
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                else
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          2
          
                  external_last_schemas_version = ExternalMasterDatabase::ExternalSchemaMigration.all.last
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  # version = nil #varibale is not used!!
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  #To get all version : ActiveRecord::Migrator.get_all_versions
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          2
          
                  local_last_schema_version = ActiveRecord::Migrator.current_version  #current local migration version
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  #if local_last_schema_version.to_i == external_last_schemas_version.version.to_i
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          2
          
                  if local_last_schema_version.to_i >= external_last_schemas_version.version.to_i
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          2
          
                    puts I18n.t (:same_schema_version)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    #Test if local data are up to date
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          2
          
                    latest_repo_update = Home::latest_repo_update
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          2
          
                    if params[:latest_local_update].nil? || latest_repo_update.nil? || (params[:latest_local_update].to_datetime < latest_repo_update.to_datetime)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          2
          
                      Home::update_master_data!
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          2
          
                      $latest_update = Time.now #Rails.cache.write("$latest_update", Time.now)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          2
          
                      flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_projestimate_data_successful_updated)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                      puts I18n.t (:reprository_up_to_date)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                      flash[:notice] =  I18n.t (:notice_masterdata_already_latest)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  else
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_db_schema_differ_to_masterdata)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          2
          
                redirect_to about_url
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              rescue Errno::ECONNREFUSED
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_default_data_failed_update)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                redirect_to about_url and return
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              rescue Exception
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_default_data_exception_update)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                redirect_to about_url
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            end
        
      65.

          end

          class LaborCategoriesController < ApplicationController

            def index
        
      27.

    47. 
          1
          
              unless @labor_category.child_reference.nil?
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                if @labor_category.child_reference.is_proposed_or_custom?
        
      49. 
      
        
    49.

    55. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_labor_categories, LaborCategory
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              @labor_category = LaborCategory.new(params[:labor_category])
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              if @labor_category.save
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_labor_category_successful_created)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(labor_categories_path)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              else
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_labor_categories, LaborCategory
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              @labor_category = nil
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              current_labor_category = LaborCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              if current_labor_category.is_defined?
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                @labor_category = current_labor_category.amoeba_dup
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                @labor_category.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              else
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                @labor_category = current_labor_category
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              if @labor_category.update_attributes(params[:labor_category])
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_notice_labor_category_successful_updated)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(labor_categories_path), :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_notice_labor_category_successful_updated)}"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              else
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_labor_categories, LaborCategory
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              @labor_category = LaborCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              if @labor_category.is_defined? || @labor_category.is_custom?
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                @labor_category.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              else
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                @labor_category.destroy
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_labor_category_successful_deleted)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              redirect_to labor_categories_path
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
            end
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
          
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          end
        
      100.

            def update
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
              authorize! :edit_languages, Language, :message => "#{I18n.t (:error_update_retired_language)}"
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
              @language = nil
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
              current_language = Language.find(params[:id])
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
              if current_language.is_defined?
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                @language = current_language.amoeba_dup
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                @language.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              else
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                @language = current_language
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
              if @language.update_attributes(params[:language])
        
      74. 
      
        
    74.

      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              else
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
                flash[:error] = "#{I18n.t (:error_language_failed_update)}"+"#{@language.errors.full_messages.to_sentence}"
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
            end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80.

      82.

            #It is only going to change ths record status : logical deletion
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1

      88.

            def update

              @master_setting = nil

              end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              if @master_setting.update_attributes(params[:master_setting])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(master_settings_path), notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_master_settings_successful_updated)}"
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              else
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
            end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
            # DELETE /master_settings/1
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
            # DELETE /master_settings/1.json
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              @master_setting = MasterSetting.find(params[:id])
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              if @master_setting.is_defined? || @master_setting.is_custom?
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                @master_setting.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              else
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                @master_setting.destroy
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_master_settings_successful_deleted)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to master_settings_url }
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
              end
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
            end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          end
        
      111.

      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
            def edit
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'Organizations'
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_organizations, Organization
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              @organization = Organization.find(params[:id])
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_organizations, Organization
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              @organization = Organization.new(params[:organization])
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              if @organization.save
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect('/organizationals_params'), notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_organization_successful_created)}"
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_organizations, Organization
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              @organization = Organization.find(params[:id])
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              if @organization.update_attributes(params[:organization])
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_organization_successful_updated)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect('/organizationals_params')
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              else
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
            end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_organizations, Organization
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              @organization = Organization.find(params[:id])
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              @organization.destroy
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_organization_successful_deleted)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              redirect_to '/organizationals_params'
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
            end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
            def organizationals_params
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'Organizational Parameters'
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              @organizations = Organization.all
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              @organizations_labor_categories = OrganizationLaborCategory.all || []
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
            end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          end

          class PasswordResetsController < ApplicationController
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
            layout 'login'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            #Edit the new password, checks token validity
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            def edit
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              @user = User.find_by_password_reset_token!(params[:id])
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
            end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            #Update the new password
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              @user = User.find_by_password_reset_token!(params[:id])
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              if @user.password_reset_sent_at < 2.hours.ago
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                UserMailer.new_password(@user).deliver
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                redirect_to new_password_reset_path, :error => "#{I18n.t (:warning_reset_password_expired)}"
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              elsif @user.update_attributes(params[:user])
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                UserMailer.new_password(@user).deliver
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                redirect_to root_url, :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_password_successful_reset)}"
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              else
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                render :edit
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46.

            def edit

            def destroy

            def selected_pbs_project_element

              @results = nil

            #Create a new pbs_project_element and refresh the partials
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
            def new
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              @pe_wbs_project = PeWbsProject.find(params[:pe_wbs_project_id])
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              @project = @pe_wbs_project.project
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              @module_positions = ModuleProject.where(:project_id => @project.id).sort_by{|i| i.position_y}.map(&:position_y).uniq.max || 1
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              @pbs_project_element = PbsProjectElement.new
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              @pbs_project_element.pe_wbs_project_id = params[:pe_wbs_project_id]
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              @pbs_project_element.parent_id = params[:comp_parent_id]
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
              if params[:type_component] == "folder"
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                @pbs_project_element.name = "New folder"
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                @pbs_project_element.work_element_type_id = WorkElementType.find_by_alias("folder").id
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              elsif params[:type_component] == "link"
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                @pbs_project_element.name = "New link"
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                @pbs_project_element.work_element_type_id = WorkElementType.find_by_alias("link").id
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              else
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                @pbs_project_element.name = "New pbs_project_element"
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                @pbs_project_element.work_element_type_id = WorkElementType.find_by_alias("undefined").id
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              @pbs_project_element.position = @pe_wbs_project.pbs_project_elements.map(&:position).max + 1
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              @pbs_project_element.save
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              #Set current pbs_project_element
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              session[:pbs_project_element_id] = @pbs_project_element.id
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              @user = current_user
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              @project.module_projects.each do |mp|
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                mp.estimation_values.reject{|i| i.pbs_project_element_id != @project.root_component.id }.each do |mpa|
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  new_mpa = mpa.dup
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  new_mpa.save
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  mpa.update_attribute("pbs_project_element_id", @pbs_project_element.id)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
              end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              @module_projects = @project.module_projects
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
              render :partial => "pbs_project_elements/refresh_tree"
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
            end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
            #Pushed up the pbs_project_element
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
            def up
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
              @project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
          
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              component_a = PbsProjectElement.find(params[:pbs_project_element_id])
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              unless component_a.position == 1
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                component_b = PbsProjectElement.find_by_position_and_pe_wbs_project_id(component_a.position - 1, params[:pe_wbs_project_id])
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                component_a.update_attribute("position", component_a.position - 1)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                component_b.update_attribute("position", component_b.position + 1)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              @user = current_user
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              render :partial => "pbs_project_elements/refresh_tree"
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
            end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
            #Pushed down the pbs_project_element
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
            def down
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              @project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              component_a = PbsProjectElement.find(params[:pbs_project_element_id])
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
              unless component_a.position == @project.pe_wbs_project.pbs_project_elements.map(&:position).max
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                component_b = PbsProjectElement.find_by_position(component_a.position + 1)
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                component_a.update_attribute("position", component_a.position + 1)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                component_b.update_attribute("position", component_b.position - 1)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              @user = current_user
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              render :partial => "pbs_project_elements/refresh_tree"
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
            end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
            def refresh_pbs_activity_ratios
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              puts "Params_activity = #{params[:wbs_activity_id]}"
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              if params[:wbs_activity_id].empty? || params[:wbs_activity_id].nil?
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                @pbs_activity_ratios = []
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              else
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:wbs_activity_id])
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                @pbs_activity_ratios = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              end
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
            end
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          end
        
      182.

            def destroy
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              @peicon = Peicon.find(params[:id])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              if @peicon.is_defined? || @peicon.is_custom?
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                @peicon.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              else
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                @peicon.icon = nil
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                @peicon.save
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                @peicon.destroy
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              redirect_to peicons_path, :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_icon_successful_deleted)}"
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
            end
        
      99.
