      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "#{@pemodule.errors.full_messages.to_sentence}"
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              redirect_to redirect(edit_pemodule_path(@pemodule))  #redirect_to redirect(pemodules_url)
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              @pemodule = Pemodule.new(params[:pemodule])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              @pemodule.compliant_component_type = params[:compliant_wet]
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              @wets = WorkElementType.all.reject{|i| i.alias == 'link'
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              }
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              @attributes = Attribute.all
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              if @pemodule.save
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(pemodules_url)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              else
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                render :new
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
            end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
            #Update attribute of the pemodule selected (2nd tabs)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
            def update_selected_attributes
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_modules, Pemodule
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              @pemodule = Pemodule.find(params[:module_id])
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
          
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              attributes_ids = params[:pemodule][:pe_attribute_ids]
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
              @pemodule.attribute_modules.each do |m|
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                m.destroy unless attributes_ids.include?(m.attribute_id.to_s)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                attributes_ids.delete(m.attribute_id.to_s)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
          
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              #Attribute module record_status is according to the Pemodule record_status
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              attributes_ids.each do |g|
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                @pemodule.attribute_modules.create(:attribute_id => g, :record_status_id => @pemodule.record_status_id) unless g.blank?
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
              end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              @pemodule.pe_attributes(force_reload = true)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              if @pemodule.save
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_pemodule_successful_updated)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              else
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:error_administration_setting_failed_update)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              @attribute_settings = AttributeModule.all(:conditions => {:pemodule_id => params[:module_id]})
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_pemodule_path(params[:module_id])
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
            end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
            #Update attribute settings (3th tabs)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
            def set_attributes_module
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_modules, Pemodule
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
              selected_attributes = params[:attributes]
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              selected_attributes.each_with_index do |attr, i|
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                conditions = {:attribute_id => attr.to_i, :pemodule_id => params[:module_id]}
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                attribute = AttributeModule.first(:conditions => conditions)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('in_out', params[:in_out][i])
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('is_mandatory', params[:is_mandatory][i])
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('description', params[:description][i])
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('custom_attribute', params[:custom_attribute][i])
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('numeric_data_low', params[:numeric_data_low][i])
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('numeric_data_most_likely', params[:numeric_data_most_likely][i])
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                attribute.update_attribute('numeric_data_high', params[:numeric_data_high][i])
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                if params[:custom_attribute][i] == 'user'
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  attribute.update_attribute('project_value', nil)
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                else
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  attribute.update_attribute('project_value', params[:project_value][i])
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_pemodule_path(params[:module_id]), :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_pemodule_successful_updated)}"
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
            end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
            # DELETE //1
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
            # DELETE //1.json
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_modules, Pemodule
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              @pemodule = Pemodule.find(params[:id])
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              if @pemodule.is_defined? || @pemodule.is_custom?
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                @pemodule.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              else
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                @pemodule.destroy
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              redirect_to pemodules_url, :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_pemodule_successful_deleted)}"
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
            end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
            #################### Move functions ####################
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          1
          
            def pemodules_up
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              @project_module = ModuleProject.find(params[:module_id])
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              @project = @project_module.project
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              if @project_module.position_y > 1
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                @project_module.update_attribute('position_y', @project_module.position_y - 1)
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              @module_positions = ModuleProject.where(:project_id => @project.id).all.map(&:position_y).uniq.max || 1
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_project_path(@project.id, :anchor => 'tabs-4')
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
            end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
            def pemodules_down
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
              @project_module = ModuleProject.find(params[:module_id])
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              @project = @project_module.project
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
              @module_positions = ModuleProject.where(:project_id => @project.id).order(:position_y).all.map(&:position_y).uniq.max || 1
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              @project_module.update_attribute('position_y', @project_module.position_y + 1 )
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_project_path(@project.id, :anchor => 'tabs-4')
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
            end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
            def pemodules_left
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              @project_module = ModuleProject.find(params[:module_id])
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
              @project = @project_module.project
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
              @module_positions = ModuleProject.where(:project_id => @project.id).order(:position_y).all.map(&:position_y).uniq.max || 1
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              if @project_module.position_x > 1
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                @project_module.update_attribute('position_x', @project_module.position_x - 1 )
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_project_path(@project.id, :anchor => 'tabs-4')
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
            end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
            def pemodules_right
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
              @project_module = ModuleProject.find(params[:module_id])
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              @project = @project_module.project
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
              @module_positions = ModuleProject.where(:project_id => @project.id).order(:position_y).all.map(&:position_y).uniq.max || 1
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
              @project_module.update_attribute('position_x', @project_module.position_x + 1 )
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_project_path(@project.id, :anchor => 'tabs-4')
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
            end
        
      215. 
      
        
    215.

            def new

            def edit
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_permissions, Permission
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'Permissions'
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              @permission = Permission.find(params[:id])
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              unless @permission.child_reference.nil?
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                if @permission.child_reference.is_proposed_or_custom?
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_permission_cant_be_edit)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                  redirect_to permissions_path
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                end
        
      64.

          1
          
            def create
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              @permission = Permission.new(params[:permission])
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              @groups = Group.all
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              if @permission.save
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(permissions_path), notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_permission_successful_created)}"
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              else
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
            end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
            # PUT /permissions/1
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
            # PUT /permissions/1.json
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              @permission = nil
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              current_permission = Permission.find(params[:id])
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              if current_permission.is_defined?
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                @permission = current_permission.amoeba_dup
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                @permission.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              else
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                @permission = current_permission
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              if @permission.update_attributes(params[:permission])
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect('/globals_permissions'), notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_function_successful_updated)}"
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              else
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              end
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
            end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
            # DELETE /permissions/1
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
            # DELETE /permissions/1.json
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              @permission = Permission.find(params[:id])
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              if @permission.is_defined? || @permission.is_custom?
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                @permission.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              else
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                @permission.destroy
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
              end
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
          
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to permissions_path, notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_permission_successful_deleted)}" }
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                format.json { head :ok }
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
            end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
            #Set all global rights
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
            def set_rights
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_permissions, Permission
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              @groups = Group.all
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              @permissions = Permission.all
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              @groups.each do |group|
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                group.update_attribute('permission_ids', params[:permissions][group.id.to_s])
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to '/globals_permissions', :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_notice_permission_successful_saved)}" }
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
            end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
          
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
            #Set all project security rights
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
            def set_rights_project_security
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_specific_permissions, Permission
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              @project_security_levels = ProjectSecurityLevel.all
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              @permissions = Permission.all
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              @project_security_levels.each do |psl|
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                psl.update_attribute('permission_ids', params[:permissions][psl.id.to_s])
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to project_securities_path, :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_notice_permission_successful_saved)}" }
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              end
        
      145.

      146. 
      
        
    146.

            def edit
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'Platform Category'
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              @platform_category = PlatformCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              unless @platform_category.child_reference.nil?
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                if @platform_category.child_reference.is_proposed_or_custom?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_platform_category_cant_be_edit)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-3'))
        
      39.

                end
        
      40.

            def create
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              @platform_category = PlatformCategory.new(params[:platform_category])
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              if @platform_category.save
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_platform_category_successful_created)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-3'))
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              else
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              @platform_category = nil
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              current_platform_category = PlatformCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              if current_platform_category.is_defined?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                @platform_category = current_platform_category.amoeba_dup
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                @platform_category.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              else
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                @platform_category = current_platform_category
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              if @platform_category.update_attributes(params[:platform_category])
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_platform_category_successful_updated)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-3'))
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              else
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
            end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              @platform_category = PlatformCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              if @platform_category.is_defined? || @platform_category.is_custom?
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                @platform_category.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              else
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                @platform_category.destroy
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_platform_category_successful_deleted)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              redirect_to projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-3')
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84.

          end

    46. 
          
          
              if @project_category.save
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_project_categories_successful_created)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-2'))
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              else
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              @project_category = nil
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              current_project_category = ProjectCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              if current_project_category.is_defined?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                @project_category = current_project_category.amoeba_dup
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                @project_category.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              else
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                @project_category = current_project_category
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              if @project_category.update_attributes(params[:project_category])
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_project_categories_successful_updated)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-2'))
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              else
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                render action: 'edit'
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
            end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              @project_category = ProjectCategory.find(params[:id])
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              if @project_category.is_defined? || @project_category.is_custom?
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on defined record
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                @project_category.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              else
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                @project_category.destroy
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_project_categories_successful_deleted)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              redirect_to projects_global_params_path(:anchor => 'tabs-2')
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          end

            def load_data
