            def create
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              @reference_value = ReferenceValue.new(params[:reference_value])
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              #If we are on local instance, Status is set to "Local"
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                @reference_value.record_status = @proposed_status
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              else
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                @reference_value.record_status = @local_status
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              if @reference_value.save
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(reference_values_path)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              else
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              @reference_value = nil
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              current_reference_value = ReferenceValue.find(params[:id])
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              if current_reference_value.is_defined? && is_master_instance?
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                @reference_value = current_reference_value.amoeba_dup
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                @reference_value.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              else
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                @reference_value = current_reference_value
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              unless is_master_instance?
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                if @reference_value.is_local_record?
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  @reference_value.custom_value = 'Locally edited'
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              if @reference_value.update_attributes(params[:reference_value])
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(reference_values_path)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              else
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                render :edit
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              end
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
            end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
            @reference_value = ReferenceValue.find(params[:id])
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                if @reference_value.is_defined? || @reference_value.is_custom?
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                  #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on defined record
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  @reference_value.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                else
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  @reference_value.destroy
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              else
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                if @reference_value.is_local_record? || @reference_value.is_retired?
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  @reference_value.destroy
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                else
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_master_record_cant_be_delete)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(reference_values_path)  and return
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_reference_value_successful_deleted)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              redirect_to reference_values_path
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
            end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          end
        
      101.

            #Display search result

          1
          
            def results
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              if params[:search].class == Array
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                classes = params[:search][:classes].map{ |i| String::keep_clean_space(i).camelcase.constantize }
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              else
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                classes = [Attribute, ProjectArea, PlatformCategory, ProjectCategory, WorkElementType, PbsProjectElement, Project, Pemodule]
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
              @results = Array.new
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
              classes.each do |class_name|
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          8
          
                @res = class_name.search do
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          8
          
                        fulltext params[:search]
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                       end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          8
          
                @results << @res.results
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
              @results = @results.flatten
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
            def user_search
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              unless params[:states] == ""
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                @users = User.where(:user_status => params[:states]).search(params[:user_searches]).page(params[:page]).per_page(5)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                @users = User.table_search(params[:user_searches]).page(params[:page]).per_page(5)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1

      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1

          class SessionsController < ApplicationController

            #Create a session for user if user is authorized
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              user = User.authenticate(params[:username], params[:password])
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              if user
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                if user.active?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  if params[:remember_me]
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                    cookies[:login] = { :value => user.login_name, :expires => Time.now + 3600}
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  #Last and previous login setting
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  user.update_attribute('previous_login', user.last_login)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  user.update_attribute('last_login', Time.now)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  #Set current user
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  session[:current_user_id] = user.id
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  #Set current project
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  if user.projects.empty?
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    session[:current_project_id] = nil
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  else
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    session[:current_project_id] = user.projects.first.id
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  redirect_to session[:remember_address] || '/dashboard', :flash => { :notice => "#{I18n.t (:text_welcome)} "+ user.name }
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                else #user.suspended? || user.blacklisted?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  redirect_to '/dashboard', :flash => { :warning => "#{I18n.t (:warning_account_black_listed)}" }
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              else
        
      54. 
      
        
    54.

      55.

      56.

            end

            def forgotten_password

            #Reset the password depending of the status of the user
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
            def reset_forgotten_password
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              user = User.first(:conditions => ['login_name = ? or email = ?', params[:login_name], params[:login_name] ])
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              if user
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                if user.auth_method.name == 'Application' or user.auth_method.nil?
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                  if user.active?
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    user.send_password_reset if user
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    redirect_to root_url, :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_session_password_reset_instruction)}"
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  else
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                    user.send_password_reset if user
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                    redirect_to root_url, :warning => "#{I18n.t (:warning_session_account_not_active)}"
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                  end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                else
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                  redirect_to root_url, :error => "#{I18n.t (:error_account_ldap_association)}"
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                end
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              else
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                redirect_to root_url, :warning => "#{I18n.t (:warning_session_bad_username)}"
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
            end

          end

              if params[:locale].nil?

            def create
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              params[:translations].each do |elem|
        
      38. 
      
        
    38.

      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40.

      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42.

      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
            end

            def create_inactive_user
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              unless (params[:email].blank? || params[:first_name].blank? || params[:last_name].blank? || params[:login_name].blank?)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                user = User.first(:conditions => ["login_name = '#{params[:login_name]}' or email = '#{params[:email]}'"])
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                if !user.nil?
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  redirect_to root_url, :warning =>"#{I18n.t (:warning_email_or_username_already_exist)}"
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                else
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  user = User.new(:email => params[:email],
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                                   :first_name => params[:first_name],
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                                   :last_name => params[:last_name],
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                                   :login_name => params[:login_name],
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                                   :language_id => params[:language],
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                                   :initials => 'your_initials',
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                                   :user_status => 'pending',
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                                   :auth_method => AuthMethod.find_by_name('Application'))
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                  user.password = Standards.random_string(8)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                  user.group_ids = [Group.last.id]
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                  user.save(:validate => false)
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                  UserMailer.account_created(user).deliver
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                  UserMailer.account_request.deliver
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  redirect_to root_url, :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_account_demand_send)}"
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              else
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                redirect_to root_url, :warning => "#{I18n.t (:warning_check_all_fields)}"
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              end
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
            end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176.

            def about

            def activate
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              @user = User.find(params[:id])
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
              unless @user.active?
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                @user.user_status = 'active'
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                @user.save(:validate => false)
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
              end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
              redirect_to users_path
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
            end
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          1
          
            def display_states
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
              unless params[:state] == ''
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          1
          
                @users = User.where(:user_status => params[:state]).page(params[:page])
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
              else
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                @users = User.page(params[:page])
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              end
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
            end
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          end

            def edit
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              @version = Version.find(params[:id])

            end

          1
          
            def create
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              @version = Version.new(params[:version])
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                if @version.save
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  format.html { redirect_to @version, notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_version_successful_created)}"}
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  format.json { render json: @version, status: :created, location: @version }
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                else
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                  format.html { render action: 'new' }
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  format.json { render json: @version.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
            # PUT /versions/1
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
            # PUT /versions/1.json
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              @version = Version.find(params[:id])
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                if @version.update_attributes(params[:version])
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                  format.html { redirect_to @version, notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_version_successful_updated)}"}
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  format.json { head :no_content }
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                else
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  format.html { render action: 'edit' }
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                  format.json { render json: @version.errors, status: :unprocessable_entity }
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
            end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
            # DELETE /versions/1
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
            # DELETE /versions/1.json
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              @version = Version.find(params[:id])
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              @version.destroy
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to versions_url }
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                format.json { head :no_content }
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
            end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          end
        
      104.

          class WbsActivitiesController < ApplicationController
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
            include DataValidationHelper #Module for master data changes validation

            def import
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              begin
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                WbsActivityElement.import(params[:file], params[:separator])
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_element_import_successful)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              rescue Exception => e
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_wbs_activity_failed_file_integrity)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                flash[:warning] = "#{e}"
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              redirect_to wbs_activities_path
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
            def refresh_ratio_elements
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio_elements = []
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id])
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              wbs_activity_elements_list = WbsActivityElement.where(:wbs_activity_id => @wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity.id).all #paginate(:page => params[:page], :per_page => 30)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_elements = WbsActivityElement.sort_by_ancestry(wbs_activity_elements_list)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_elements.each do |wbs|
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_ratio_elements += wbs.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.where(:wbs_activity_ratio_id => params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id]).all
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              @total = @wbs_activity_ratio_elements.reject{|i| i.ratio_value.nil? or i.ratio_value.blank? }.compact.sum(&:ratio_value)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
            def index
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1

      57.

            end
        
      59.

            def edit
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          1
          
              set_page_title 'WBS activities'
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
              @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:id])
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
              @wbs_activity_elements_list = WbsActivityElement.where(:wbs_activity_id => @wbs_activity.id).all#.paginate(:page => params[:page], :per_page => 30)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
              @wbs_activity_elements = WbsActivityElement.sort_by_ancestry(@wbs_activity_elements_list)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
              @wbs_activity_ratios = WbsActivityRatio.where(:wbs_activity_id => @wbs_activity.id)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio_elements = []
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
              @total = 0
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
              if params[:Ratio]
        
      71.

                @wbs_activity_elements.each do |wbs|

                  @wbs_activity_ratio_elements += wbs.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.where(:wbs_activity_ratio_id => params[:Ratio]).all

    73.

      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              else
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1

    77. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_elements.each do |wbs|

                      @wbs_activity_ratio_elements += wbs.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.where(:wbs_activity_ratio_id => @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios.first.id).paginate(:page => params[:page], :per_page => 30)#all
        
      79.

                  end

            def update
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:id])
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_elements = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratios = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              unless @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios.empty?
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_ratio_elements = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios.first.wbs_activity_ratio_elements
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity.is_defined?
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity.owner_id = current_user.id
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              else
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity.is_local_record?
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity.custom_value = 'Locally edited'
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity.update_attributes(params[:wbs_activity])
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(wbs_activities_path)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              else
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                render :edit
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
              end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
            end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
            def new
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
              set_page_title 'WBS activities'
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
              @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.new
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
            end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.new(params[:wbs_activity])
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              #If we are on local instance, Status is set to "Local"
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity.record_status = @proposed_status
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity.state = 'defined'
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
               else #so not on master
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity.record_status = @local_status
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity.save
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity.is_local_record?
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_element = WbsActivityElement.new(:name => @wbs_activity.name, :wbs_activity => @wbs_activity, :description => 'Root Element', :record_status => @local_status, :is_root => true)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                else
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_element = WbsActivityElement.new(:name => @wbs_activity.name, :wbs_activity => @wbs_activity, :description => 'Root Element', :record_status => @proposed_status, :is_root => true)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_element.save
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(wbs_activities_path)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
              else
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                render :new
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
            end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:id])
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity.is_defined?
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity.update_attribute(:record_status_id, @retired_status.id)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                else
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity.destroy
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              else
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity.is_local_record? #|| @wbs_activity.is_retired?
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  if @wbs_activity.defined?
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    @wbs_activity.update_attribute(:state, 'retired')
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  else
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                      @wbs_activity.destroy
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                  end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                else
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_master_record_cant_be_delete)
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(wbs_activities_path)  and return
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
          
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_successful_deleted)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              redirect_to wbs_activities_path
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
            end
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
            #Method to duplicate WBS-Activity and associated WBS-Activity-Elements
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
            def duplicate_wbs_activity
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              begin
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                old_wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:wbs_activity_id])
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                new_wbs_activity = old_wbs_activity.amoeba_dup   #amoeba gem is configured in WbsActivity class model
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                if is_master_instance?
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                  new_wbs_activity.record_status = @proposed_status
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                  new_wbs_activity.state = 'defined'
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                else
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  new_wbs_activity.record_status = @local_status
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                  new_wbs_activity.state = 'draft'
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                new_wbs_activity.uuid =  UUIDTools::UUID.random_create.to_s
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                new_wbs_activity.transaction do
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                  if new_wbs_activity.save(:validate => false)
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                    old_wbs_activity.save  #Original WbsActivity copy number will be incremented to 1
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
          
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                    #we also have to save to wbs_activity_ratio
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                    old_wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios.each do |ratio|
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                      ratio.save
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                    end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
          
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                    #Managing the compoment tree
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                    new_wbs_activity_elements = new_wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                    new_wbs_activity_elements.each do |new_elt|
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                      unless new_elt.is_root?
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                        new_ancestor_ids_list = []
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                        new_elt.ancestor_ids.each do |ancestor_id|
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                          ancestor_id = WbsActivityElement.find_by_wbs_activity_id_and_copy_id(new_elt.wbs_activity_id, ancestor_id).id
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                          new_ancestor_ids_list.push(ancestor_id)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                        end
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                        new_elt.ancestry = new_ancestor_ids_list.join('/')
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                        new_elt.save
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                      end
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                    end
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                    new_wbs_activity_ratios = new_wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                    new_wbs_activity_ratios.each do |act_ratio|
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                      act_ratio.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.each do |act_ratio_elt|
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                        wbs_activity_elt = WbsActivityElement.where('copy_id = ? and wbs_activity_id = ?', act_ratio_elt.wbs_activity_element_id, act_ratio_elt.wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity_id).first
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                        act_ratio_elt.wbs_activity_element_id = wbs_activity_elt.id
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                        act_ratio_elt.save
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                      end
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                    end
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                  else
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                    flash[:error] = "#{new_wbs_activity.errors.full_messages.to_sentence}"
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                  end
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                end
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                redirect_to('/wbs_activities', :notice  =>  "#{I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_successful_duplicated)}") and return
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
          
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotSaved => e
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "#{new_wbs_activity.errors.full_messages.to_sentence}"
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_wbs_activity_failed_duplicate)+' '+new_wbs_activity.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                redirect_to '/wbs_activities'
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
            end
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
          
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
            def wbs_record_statuses_collection
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity.new_record?
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                if is_master_instance?
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('name = ?', 'Proposed')
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                else
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('name = ?', 'Local')
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                end
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
              else
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                @wbs_record_status_collection = []
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity.is_defined?
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('name = ?', 'Defined')
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                else
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('name <> ?', 'Defined')
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                end
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
              end
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
            end
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
          
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            #This function will validate teh WBS-Activity and all its elements
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
            def validate_change_with_children
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
              begin
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
                wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:id])
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
                wbs_activity.record_status = @defined_status
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
                wbs_activity_root_element = WbsActivityElement.where('wbs_activity_id = ? and is_root = ?', wbs_activity.id, true).first
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
          
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                wbs_activity.transaction do
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                  if wbs_activity.save
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
                    wbs_activity_root_element.transaction do
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
                      subtree = wbs_activity_root_element.subtree #all descendants (direct and indirect children) and itself
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
                      subtree_for_validation = subtree.is_ok_for_validation(@defined_status.id, @retired_status.id)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                      subtree_for_validation.update_all(:record_status_id => @defined_status.id)
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                      #flash[:notice] =  "Wbs-Activity-Element and all its children were successfully validated."
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                    end
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
          
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                    #TODO : Validate also Ratio and Ratio_Element of each wbs_activity_element
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
                    wbs_activity_ratios = wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
                    wbs_activity_ratios.each do |ratio|
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
                      ratio.transaction do
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
                        ratio.record_status = @defined_status
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
                        if ratio.save
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
                          wbs_activity_ratio_elements = ratio.wbs_activity_ratio_elements
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                          wbs_activity_ratio_elements.update_all(:record_status_id => @defined_status.id)
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
                        end
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
                      end
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
                    end
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
                    flash[:notice] =I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_successful_updated)
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
                  else
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
                    flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_wbs_activity_failed_update)+ ' ' +wbs_activity_root_element.errors.full_messages.to_sentence+'.'
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
                  end
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                end
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
          
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
                redirect_to :back
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
          
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
              rescue ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid => error
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
                put "#{error.message}"
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "#{error.message}"
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
                redirect_to :back and return
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => err
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "#{err.message}"
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
                redirect_to :back
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
              end
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
            end
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
          
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
            #Function that enable/disable to update
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          1
          
            def enable_update_in_local?
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
                true
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
              else
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
                if params[:action] == 'new'
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
                  true
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
                elsif params[:action] == 'edit'
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:id])
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
                  #if @wbs_activity.is_local_record? && @wbs_activity.defined?
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
                  if @wbs_activity.is_defined? || @wbs_activity.defined?
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
                    false
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
                  else
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
                    true
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
                  end
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
                end
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
              end
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
            end
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
          
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
          end
        
      316.

          class WbsActivityElementsController < ApplicationController
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
            include PeWbsHelper
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
            include DataValidationHelper #Module for master data changes validation
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
            helper_method :wbs_record_statuses_collection
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            helper_method :selected_record_status
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
            before_filter :get_record_statuses
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
            def new
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'WBS-Activity elements'
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_element = WbsActivityElement.new
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              #@wbs_record_status_collection = wbs_record_statuses_collection
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              if params[:activity_id]
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:activity_id])
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                @potential_parents = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              @selected_parent ||= WbsActivityElement.find(params[:selected_parent_id])
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              @selected_record_status = RecordStatus.where('id = ? ', @selected_parent.record_status_id).first
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
            end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
            def edit
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'WBS-Activity elements'
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_element = WbsActivityElement.find(params[:id])
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              #@wbs_record_status_collection = wbs_record_statuses_collection
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              if params[:activity_id]
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:activity_id])
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity_element.ancestry.nil?
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  @potential_parents = []
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                else
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  @potential_parents = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              @selected_parent = @wbs_activity_element.parent
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              @selected_record_status = RecordStatus.where('id = ? ', @wbs_activity_element.record_status_id).first
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              unless is_master_instance?
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity_element.is_defined?
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_master_record_cant_be_delete)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  redirect_to edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity_element.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-2') and return
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
            end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_element = WbsActivityElement.new(params[:wbs_activity_element])
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              #@wbs_record_status_collection = wbs_record_statuses_collection
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              @selected_parent ||= WbsActivityElement.find(params[:wbs_activity_element][:parent_id])
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              @selected_record_status = RecordStatus.where('id = ? ', @selected_parent.record_status_id).first
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity = @wbs_activity_element.wbs_activity
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
              @potential_parents = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              #If we are on local instance, Status is set to "Local"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity_element.is_root
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                if is_master_instance?   #so not on master
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_element.record_status = @proposed_status
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                else
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_element.record_status = @local_status
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              else
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_element.record_status = @wbs_activity_element.parent.record_status
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity_element.save
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios.each do |wbs_activity_ratio|
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_ratio_element = WbsActivityRatioElement.new(:ratio_value => nil,
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                                                                            :wbs_activity_ratio_id => wbs_activity_ratio.id,
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                                                                            :wbs_activity_element_id => @wbs_activity_element.id)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_ratio_element.save(:validate => false)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                end
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                redirect_to edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-2'), notice: "#{I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_element_successful_created)}"
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              else
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                selected = WbsActivityElement.find(params[:wbs_activity_element][:parent_id]) #@selected = @wbs_activity_element.parent
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                @selected_record_status = RecordStatus.where('id = ? ', selected.record_status_id).first
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                render action: 'new'
        
      103. 
      
        
    103.

            def update

              @wbs_activity ||= WbsActivity.find_by_id(params[:wbs_activity_element][:wbs_activity_id])

              @potential_parents = @wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements if @wbs_activity
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              @selected_parent = @wbs_activity_element.parent

    113.

      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              unless is_master_instance?

      120.

      122.

                @wbs_activity = WbsActivity.find(params[:wbs_activity_element][:wbs_activity_id])

      124.

            def destroy
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_element = WbsActivityElement.find(params[:id])

                  #logical deletion  delete don't have to suppress records anymore on Defined record
        
      139.

                  @wbs_activity_element.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)

            def wbs_record_statuses_collection
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              @wbs_record_status_collection = []
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              #if self.action_name == "new"
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity_element.new_record?
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                unless params[:selected_parent_id].blank?
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                  element_parent = WbsActivityElement.find(params[:selected_parent_id])
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('id =? ', element_parent.record_status_id)
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                end
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
              else
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity_element.is_defined?
        
      200. 
      
        
    200.

      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                else
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('name <> ?', 'Defined')
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
              end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
              @wbs_record_status_collection

            def update_status_collection
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
              @wbs_record_status_collection = []
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
              unless params[:selected_parent_id].blank?
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                element_parent = WbsActivityElement.find(params[:selected_parent_id])
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                parent_record_status = RecordStatus.find(element_parent.record_status_id)
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                if parent_record_status == @defined_status
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('id =? ', element_parent.record_status_id)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                else
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                  @wbs_record_status_collection = RecordStatus.where('name <> ? ', 'Defined')
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                end
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
              end
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
          
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
            end
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
          
        
      222.

      223.

            def edit

            def new
        
      32.

            def save_values
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              #set ratio values
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              ratio_values = params[:ratio_values]
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              ratio_values.each do |i|
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                w = WbsActivityRatioElement.find(i.first)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                #if w.wbs_activity_ratio.is_All_Activity_Elements?
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                unless i.last.blank?
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  if i.last.to_f <=0 or i.last.to_f>100
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    flash.now[:warning] = I18n.t(:warning_wbs_activity_ratio_elt_value_range)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                w.ratio_value = i.last
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                w.save(:validate => false)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              #Select ratio and elements
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id])
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              #set ratio reference (all to false then one to true)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.each do |wbs_activity_ratio_element|
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                wbs_activity_ratio_element.update_attribute('simple_reference',  false)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                wbs_activity_ratio_element.update_attribute('multiple_references',  false)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              if params[:multiple_references]
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                  params[:multiple_references].each do |p|
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    new_ref = WbsActivityRatioElement.find_by_id(p)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    new_ref.update_attribute('multiple_references', true)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              if params[:simple_reference]
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                new_ref = WbsActivityRatioElement.find_by_id_and_wbs_activity_ratio_id(params[:simple_reference], params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id])
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                new_ref.update_attribute('simple_reference', true)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              #keep current ratio
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              @selected_ratio = wbs_activity_ratio
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio_elements = wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.all
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              #@wbs_activity_ratio_elements = WbsActivityRatioElement.where(:wbs_activity_ratio_id => wbs_activity_ratio.id).all
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              #sum total ratio_value
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              @total = @wbs_activity_ratio_elements.reject{|i| i.ratio_value.nil? or i.ratio_value.blank? }.compact.sum(&:ratio_value)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              #we test total
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              if @total != 100
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                flash.now[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_sum_ratio_different_100)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              else
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                flash.now[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_ratio_successful_saved)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      89. 
      
        
    89.

      90.

              end
