          1
          
          class WbsActivityRatiosController < ApplicationController
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
            include DataValidationHelper #Module for master data changes validation
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
            before_filter :get_record_statuses
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            def export
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id])
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              csv_string = WbsActivityRatio::export(@wbs_activity_ratio.id)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              send_data(csv_string, :type => 'text/csv; header=present', :disposition => "attachment; filename=#{@wbs_activity_ratio.name}.csv")
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
            def import
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id])
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              begin
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                error_count = WbsActivityRatio::import(params[:file], params[:separator], params[:encoding])
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_wbs_activity_failed_import)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                redirect_to edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-3') and return
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              ratio_elements = @wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity_ratio_elements
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              total = ratio_elements.reject{|i| i.ratio_value.nil? or i.ratio_value.blank? }.compact.sum(&:ratio_value)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              if error_count != 0
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_wbs_activity_failed_import)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              elsif total != 100
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                flash[:warning] =I18n.t (:warning_import_sum_ratio_different_100)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              elsif error_count == 0 and total == 100
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_ratio_successful_imported)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-3')
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
            def edit
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'Edit wbs-activity ratio'
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:id])
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              @reference_values =ReferenceValue.all.map{|i| [i.value, i.id]}
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
            end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:id])
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              @reference_values =ReferenceValue.all.map{|i| [i.value, i.id]}
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              unless is_master_instance?
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity_ratio.is_local_record?
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_ratio.custom_value = 'Locally edited'
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity_ratio.update_attributes(params[:wbs_activity_ratio])
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-3'))
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              else
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                render :edit
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              end
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
            end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1
          
            def new
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
              set_page_title 'New wbs-activity ratio'
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.new
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              @reference_values =ReferenceValue.all.map{|i| [i.value, i.id]}
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
            def create
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.new(params[:wbs_activity_ratio])
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              @reference_values =ReferenceValue.all.map{|i| [i.value, i.id]}
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              #If we are on local instance, Status is set to "Local"
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              unless is_master_instance?   #so not on master
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_ratio.record_status = @local_status
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              if @wbs_activity_ratio.save
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                @wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity.wbs_activity_elements.each do |wbs_activity_element|
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                  ware = WbsActivityRatioElement.new(:ratio_value => nil,
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                                                     #:ratio_reference_element => false,
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                                                     :wbs_activity_ratio_id => @wbs_activity_ratio.id,
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                                                     :wbs_activity_element_id => wbs_activity_element.id,
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                                                     :record_status_id => @wbs_activity_ratio.record_status_id,
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                                                     :uuid => UUIDTools::UUID.random_create.to_s)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                  ware.save(:validate => false)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                redirect_to redirect(edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-3'))
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              else
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                render :new
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
            end
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
          
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
            def destroy
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
              @wbs_activity_ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:id])
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              if is_master_instance?
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity_ratio.is_defined? || @wbs_activity_ratio.is_custom?
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                  #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore on defined record
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_ratio.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                else
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_ratio.destroy
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              else
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                if @wbs_activity_ratio.is_local_record? || @wbs_activity_ratio.is_retired?
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                  @wbs_activity_ratio.destroy
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                else
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = I18n.t (:warning_master_record_cant_be_delete)
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  redirect_to redirect(groups_path)  and return
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_successful_deleted)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              redirect_to redirect(edit_wbs_activity_path(@wbs_activity_ratio.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-3'))
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
            def validate_ratio
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              @ratio = WbsActivityRatio.find(params[:ratio_id])
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              @ratio.record_status =  @defined_status
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              @ratio.transaction do
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                if @ratio.save
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                  @ratio.wbs_activity_ratio_elements.update_all(:record_status_id => @defined_status.id)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  flash[:notice] = I18n.t (:notice_wbs_activity_ratio_successful_validated)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                else
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                  flash[:error] = @ratio.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                end
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_wbs_activity_path(@ratio.wbs_activity, :anchor => 'tabs-3')
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
            end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          end
        
      147.

            def disabled_if_from_library
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              if params[:action] == 'new'
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                false
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              else
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                if @wbs_project_element.wbs_activity.nil?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  false
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                else
        
      31.

                  true
        
      32.

            def create
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          3
          
              @wbs_project_element = WbsProjectElement.new(params[:wbs_project_element])
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          3
          
              @wbs_project_element.author_id = current_user.id
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          3
          
              @project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              #@selected_parent ||= WbsProjectElement.find_by_id(params[:selected_parent_id])
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          3
          
              @selected_parent ||= params[:parent_id]
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          3

            def update
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              @wbs_project_element = WbsProjectElement.find(params[:id])

    120.

      128.

      132. 
      
        
    132.

      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  flash[:error] = @wbs_project_element.errors.full_messages.to_sentence
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  format.html { render action: 'edit' }
        
      135. 
      
        
    135.

      136. 
      
        
    136.

      137. 
      
        
    137.

            def destroy
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              @wbs_project_element = WbsProjectElement.find(params[:id])
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              @project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              if (@wbs_project_element.destroy_leaf)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                if @wbs_project_element.destroy
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                  @project.included_wbs_activities.delete(@wbs_project_element.wbs_activity_id)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  @project.save
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                respond_to do |format|
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  #format.html { redirect_to edit_project_path(@project), :notice => 'Wbs-Project-Element was successfully deleted.' }
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  format.html { redirect_to edit_project_path(@project, :anchor => 'tabs-3'), :notice => "#{I18n.t (:notice_wbs_project_element_successful_deleted)}" }
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  format.json { head :no_content }
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158.

            def selected_wbs_project_element
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              session[:wbs_project_element_id] = params[:id]
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
          
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              @user = current_user
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              @project = current_project
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
              @wbs_project_element = current_wbs_project_element
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              @module_positions = ModuleProject.where(:project_id => @project.id).sort_by{|i| i.position_y}.map(&:position_y).uniq.max || 1
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              render :partial => 'wbs_project_elements/refresh'
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
            end

            def change_wbs_project_ratio
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              @project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              @wbs_project_element = WbsProjectElement.find(params[:wbs_project_id])
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              @possible_wbs_activity_ratios = @wbs_project_element.wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
            def update_wbs_project_ratio_value
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              @project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              @wbs_project_element = WbsProjectElement.find(params[:wbs_project_id])
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
              @possible_wbs_activity_ratios = @wbs_project_element.wbs_activity.wbs_activity_ratios
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
              @wbs_project_element.wbs_activity_ratio_id = params[:wbs_activity_ratio_id]
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
              if @wbs_project_element.save
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                flash[:notice] = @wbs_project_element.name+" #{I18n.t (:notice_ratio_successful_changed)}"
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              else
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = I18n.t (:error_wbs_project_element_ratio_failed_update)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
              end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                format.html { redirect_to edit_project_path(@project, :anchor => 'tabs-3') }
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                format.js { redirect_to edit_project_path(@project, :anchor => 'tabs-3') }
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
            end

            def update
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_wet, WorkElementType
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              @work_element_type = nil

    73.

      74. 
      
        
    74.

    75.

    76.

      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                @work_element_type = current_work_element_type

    78. 
          
          
              end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79.

            def destroy
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              authorize! :manage_wet, WorkElementType
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              @work_element_type = WorkElementType.find(params[:id])
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              if @work_element_type.is_defined? || @work_element_type.is_custom?
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                #logical deletion: delete don't have to suppress records anymore
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                @work_element_type.update_attributes(:record_status_id => @retired_status.id, :owner_id => current_user.id)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              else
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                @work_element_type.destroy
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100.

    25. 
          1
          
            def sortable(column, title = nil, controller_name = nil)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              title ||= column.titleize
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              #direction = column == sort_column &&
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              sort_direction == "asc" ? "desc" : "asc"
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              link_to title, { :sort => column, :direction => sort_direction, :page => nil }, :method => "get", :remote => true
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
            def pop_up(id, title, to_container=true, &block)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          		ret = content_tag(:div, { :class => "pop_up", :style => "display: none;", :id => id }) do
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          			res = content_tag(:div, { :class => "pop_up_title_bar"}) do
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          				content_tag(:h1, title) + link_to_function('X', "hide_popup('#{id}')", :class => "pop_up_close_button")
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          			end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          			res += capture(&block) if block_given?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          			res
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          		end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
            def javascript_heads
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              tags =javascript_tag("$(window).load(function(){ warn_me('#{escape_javascript I18n.t (:text_warn_on_leaving_unsaved)}'); });")
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              tags
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
            end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
            #Avoid repetition in views when setting page title
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1

      49.

      50.

              "<h1 class = 'action_title'>#{title}</h1>"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
            end

            def probable_value_save(results, mpa)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              attribute_alias = mpa.attribute.alias.to_sym
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              if mpa.attribute.attribute_type == "numeric"
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                min = results[:low][attribute_alias].to_f
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                ml = results[:most_likely][attribute_alias].to_f
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                high = results[:high][attribute_alias].to_f
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                res = (min+4*ml+high)/6
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              else
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                "-"
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
            end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            # Compute the probable result for each node
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            # results: estimation result for (low, most_likely, high)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            # estimation_value : the estimation_value object
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
            def probable_value(results, estimation_value)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              minimum = 0.0
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              most_likely = 0.0
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              maximum = 0.0
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              attribute_alias = estimation_value.attribute.alias.to_sym
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              min_estimation_value = results[:low]["#{estimation_value.attribute.alias}_#{estimation_value.module_project_id.to_s}".to_sym]
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              most_likely_estimation_value = results[:most_likely]["#{estimation_value.attribute.alias}_#{estimation_value.module_project_id.to_s}".to_sym]
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              high_estimation_value = results[:high]["#{estimation_value.attribute.alias}_#{estimation_value.module_project_id.to_s}".to_sym]
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              # Get the current estimation Module
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              if estimation_value.module_project.pemodule.with_activities
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                hash_data_probable = Hash.new
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                min_estimation_value.keys.each do |wbs_project_elt_id|
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  minimum = min_estimation_value[wbs_project_elt_id].to_f
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  most_likely = most_likely_estimation_value[wbs_project_elt_id].to_f
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  maximum = high_estimation_value[wbs_project_elt_id].to_f
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  hash_data_probable[wbs_project_elt_id] = (minimum + 4*most_likely + maximum) / 6
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                hash_data_probable
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              else
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                data_probable =  (min_estimation_value.to_f + 4*most_likely_estimation_value.to_f + high_estimation_value.to_f) / 6
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          end

          module PeWbsProjectsHelper

            #Generate an powerful Work Breakdown Structure
        
      23.

            ##========================================== FOR WBS PRODUCT ======================================================##
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
              def generate_wbs_product(pbs_project_element, project, tree, gap)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                #Root is always display
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                if pbs_project_element.is_root?
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  tree << "<ul >
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                     #{wbs_root_links(pbs_project_element, project)}"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                if pbs_project_element.has_children?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  gap = gap + 2
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  tree << "<ul class='sortable' style='margin-left:#{gap}px; border-left: 1px solid black; padding-left: 8px;''>"
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  pbs_project_element.children.sort_by(&:position).each do |c|
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    if c.work_element_type.alias == "folder"
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                      tree << wbs_folder_links(c, project)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    else
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                      tree << wbs_navigation_links(c)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                    end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    generate_wbs_product(c, project, tree, gap)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  tree << "</ul>"
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  #Nothing
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                return tree
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
              def wbs_navigation_links(c)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                "<li class='#{ c.id == session[:pbs_project_element_id] ? 'selected' : '' }'  >
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_label'>
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    <div>
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                      #{image_tag c.work_element_type.peicon.nil? ? '' : c.work_element_type.peicon.icon.url(:small)}
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                      #{ link_to(c.name, { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'selected_pbs_project_element', :id => c.id}, :remote => true, :class => "libelle") }
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    </div>
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_link'>
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", edit_pbs_project_element_path(c, :project_id => @project.id), :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-edit icon-large' if can? :edit_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement}
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", c, confirm: 'Are you sure?', method: :delete, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-trash icon-large' if can? :delete_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement}
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'up', :pbs_project_element_id => c.id, :pe_wbs_project_id => c.pe_wbs_project_id, :project_id => @project.id}, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-arrow-up icon-large ' if can? :move_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'down' ,:pbs_project_element_id => c.id, :pe_wbs_project_id => c.pe_wbs_project_id, :project_id => @project.id}, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-arrow-down icon-large ' if can? :move_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", '#', :class => "bl icon-ok icon-large #{c.is_validated? ? 'icon-green' : 'icon-red' }" }
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", '#', :class => "bl icon-ok-circle icon-large #{c.is_completed? ? 'icon-green' : 'icon-red' }" }
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                </li>"
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
              def wbs_folder_links(c, project)
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                "<li class='#{ c.id == session[:pbs_project_element_id] ? 'selected' : '' }' >
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_label'>
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    <div onClick='toggle_folder(this);' >
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                      #{image_tag c.work_element_type.peicon.nil? ? '' : c.work_element_type.peicon.icon.url(:small)}
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                      #{ link_to(c.name, { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'selected_pbs_project_element', :id => c.id}, :remote => true, :class => "libelle") }
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    </div>
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_link'>
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to("", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_projects.wbs_product.first.id, :comp_parent_id => c.id, :type_component => "folder" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-folder-open icon-large') if can? :add_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement}
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_projects.wbs_product.first.id, :comp_parent_id => c.id, :type_component => "undefined" },:remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-folder-plus icon-large ' if can? :add_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_projects.wbs_product.first.id, :comp_parent_id => c.id, :type_component => "link" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-folder-link icon-large ' if can? :add_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement}
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", edit_pbs_project_element_path(c, :project_id => @project.id), :remote => true, :class => 'bl edit' if can? :edit_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", c, confirm: 'Are you sure?', method: :delete, :remote => true, :class => 'bl delete' if can? :delete_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'up', :pbs_project_element_id => c.id, :pe_wbs_project_id => c.pe_wbs_project_id, :project_id => @project.id}, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-arrow-up icon-large ' if can? :move_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'down' ,:pbs_project_element_id => c.id, :pe_wbs_project_id => c.pe_wbs_project_id, :project_id => @project.id}, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-arrow-down icon-large ' if can? :move_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                </li>"
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              end
        
      91.

      92.

          1
          
              def wbs_root_links(pbs_project_element, project)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                "<li>
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_label'>
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    <div onClick='toggle_folder(this);' >
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      #{ image_tag pbs_project_element.work_element_type.peicon.nil? ? '' : pbs_project_element.work_element_type.peicon.icon.url(:small) }
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                      #{ link_to(pbs_project_element.name + ' - Product Breakdown Structure', { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'selected_pbs_project_element', :id => pbs_project_element.id}, :remote => true, :class => "libelle ") }
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                    </div>
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_link'>
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to("", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_projects.wbs_product.first.id, :comp_parent_id => pbs_project_element.id, :type_component => "folder" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-folder-open icon-large') if can? :add_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_projects.wbs_product.first.id, :comp_parent_id => pbs_project_element.id, :type_component => "" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-plus icon-large ' if can? :add_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'pbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_projects.wbs_product.first.id, :comp_parent_id => pbs_project_element.id, :type_component => "link" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-link icon-large '  if can? :add_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", edit_pbs_project_element_path(pbs_project_element, :project_id => @project.id), :remote => true, :class => 'bl icon-edit icon-large' if can? :edit_a_pbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  </div>

            ##========================================== FOR WBS ACTIVITY ======================================================##
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
              def generate_wbs_activity(wbs_project_element, project, tree, gap)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                #Root is always display
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                if wbs_project_element.is_root?
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                  tree << "<ul >
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                     #{wbs_root_links(wbs_project_element, project)}"
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                if wbs_project_element.has_children?
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  gap = gap + 2
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                  tree << "<ul class='sortable' style='margin-left:#{gap}px; border-left: 1px solid black; padding-left: 8px;''>"
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                  wbs_project_element.children.sort_by(&:position).each do |c|
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                    #if c.work_element_type.alias == "folder"
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                      #tree << wbs_folder_links(c, project)
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                    tree << wbs_project_elt_links(c, project)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    #else
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    #  tree << wbs_navigation_links(c)
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    #end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                    generate_wbs_activity(c, project, tree, gap)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  tree << "</ul>"
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                else
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  #Nothing
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                return tree
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
              end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
              def wbs_project_element_links(c, project)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                "<li class='#{ c.id == session[:wbs_project_element_id] ? 'selected' : '' }' >
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_label'>
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                    <div onClick='toggle_folder(this);' >
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                      #{ link_to(c.name, { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'selected_wbs_project_element', :id => c.id}, :remote => true, :class => "libelle") }
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                    </div>
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_link'>
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to("", { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_project.id, :comp_parent_id => c.id, :type_component => "folder" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl new_folder ') if can? :add_a_wbs_project_element, WbsProjectElement}
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_project.id, :comp_parent_id => c.id, :type_component => "undefined" },:remote => true, :class => 'bl new_undefined ' if can? :add_a_wbs_project_element, WbsProjectElement }
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_project.id, :comp_parent_id => c.id, :type_component => "link" }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl new_link ' if can? :add_a_wbs_project_element, WbsProjectElement}
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                #{ link_to "", edit_wbs_project_element_path(c, :project_id => @project.id), :remote => true, :class => 'bl edit' if can? :edit_a_wbs_project_element, WbsProjectElement }
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                #{ link_to "", c, confirm: 'Are you sure?', method: :delete, :remote => true, :class => 'bl delete' if can? :delete_a_wbs_project_element, WbsProjectElement }
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                </li>"
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              end

              def wbs_activity_navigation_links(c)

      160.

      161. 
      
        
    161.

      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                      #{ link_to(c.name, { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'selected_wbs_project_element', :id => c.id}, :remote => true, :class => "libelle") }
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                    </div>
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      165. 
      
        
    165.

      166.

      167.

              def wbs_project_element_root_links(wbs_project_element, project)
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                "<li>
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_label'>
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                    <div onClick='toggle_folder(this);' >
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                      #{ link_to(project.title, { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'selected_wbs_project_element', :id => wbs_project_element.id}, :remote => true, :class => "libelle ") }
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                    </div>
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  <div class='block_link'>
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                    #{ link_to "", { :controller => 'wbs_project_elements', :action => 'new', :pe_wbs_project_id => project.pe_wbs_project.id, :parent_id => wbs_project_element.id }, :remote => true, :class => 'bl new_link '  if can? :add_a_wbs_project_element, WbsProjectElement }
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                #{ link_to "", edit_wbs_project_element_path(wbs_project_element, :project_id => @project.id), :remote => true, :class => 'bl edit' if can? :edit_a_wbs_project_element, PbsProjectElement }
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  </div>
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                </li>"
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
              end

          1
          
          module ProjectsHelper
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
            def build_find_use_project_popup(project_id)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              project = Project.find(project_id)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              pop_up("find_use_project_#{project_id}", "Find use Project #{project_id}") do
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                title = content_tag(:p, "Relationships with #{project} :")
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                x = content_tag(:li, "Liste des projets associs au projet #{project}")
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                ul = content_tag(:ul, title+x)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                ul
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            # This helper method will display Estimation Result according the estimation purpose (PBS and/or Activities)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
            def display_results
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              res = String.new
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              pbs_project_element = @pbs_project_element || current_project.root_component
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              current_project.module_projects.each do |module_project|
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                if module_project.pemodule.with_activities
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                  res << display_results_with_activities(module_project)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                else
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  res << display_results_without_activities(module_project)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                res
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              res
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
            end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
            def display_results_without_activities(module_project)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              res = String.new
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              pbs_project_element = @pbs_project_element || current_project.root_component
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              ##@module_projects.each do |module_project|
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                pemodule = Pemodule.find(module_project.pemodule.id)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                res << "<div class='widget'>"
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                res << "<div class='widget-header'>
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                            <h3>#{module_project.pemodule.title.humanize} - #{pbs_project_element.name}</h3>
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                          </div>"
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                res << "<div class='widget-content'>"
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                res << "<table class='table table-bordered'>
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                             <tr>
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                               <th></th>"
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                ["low", "most_likely", "high", "probable"].each do |level|
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  res << "<th>#{level.humanize}</th>"
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                res << "</tr>"
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                module_project.estimation_values.where("in_out = ?", "output").each do |estimation_value|
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  res << "<tr><td>#{estimation_value.attribute.name}</td>"
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                  ["low", "most_likely", "high", "probable"].each do |level|
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    res << "<td>"
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    level_estimation_value = Hash.new
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    level_estimation_value = estimation_value.send("string_data_#{level}")
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    if level_estimation_value.nil? || level_estimation_value[pbs_project_element.id].nil?
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                      res << "-"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                    else
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                      res << "#{level_estimation_value[pbs_project_element.id]}"
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    res << "</td>"
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  res << "</tr>"
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                res << "</table>"
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                res << "</div>"
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                res << "</div>"
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              #end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              res
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
            end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
            #The view to display result with ACTIVITIES
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
            def display_results_with_activities(module_project)
        
      98.

    136.

      140.

            def display_link(res, params)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
              link_to(raw("#{ res.to_s.gsub(/(#{params})/i, '<strong>\1</strong>')}") , "/#{String::keep_clean_space(res.class.to_s.underscore.pluralize)}/#{res.id}/edit" , :class => "search_result")
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            end

          module UsersHelper

            def build_find_use_user_popup(user_id)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                user = User.find(user_id)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                title = content_tag(:p, "Relationships with #{user} :")
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                li = String.new
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                user.projects.each do |user_project|
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  li << content_tag(:li, user_project.title)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                res = "
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                        #{title}
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                        <ul>
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                          #{li}
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                        </ul>
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                      "
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                return res
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            end

            def page_navigation_links(pages, param_name=:page)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              will_paginate(pages, :params => {:anchor => "tabs-4"}, :class => 'pagination', :inner_window => 2, :outer_window => 0, :renderer => BootstrapHelper::LinkRenderer, :previous_label => '&larr;'.html_safe, :next_label => '&rarr;'.html_safe, :param_name => param_name)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            end
        
      6.

            def generate_activity_element_tree(element, tree)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              #Root is always display
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              tree ||= String.new
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              unless element.nil?
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                if element.is_root?
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  tree << "<ul style='margin-left:1em;' id='tree'>
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                             <li style='margin-left:-1em;'>
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                              <div class='block_label'>
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                                  #{show_element_name(element)}
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                              </div>
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                              <div class='block_link'>
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                                #{ link_activity_element(element) }
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                              </div>
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                            </li>"
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                if element.has_children?
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  tree << "<ul class='sortable'>"
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  element.children.each do |e|
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    tree << "<ul>
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                               <li style='margin-left:#{element.depth}em;' >
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                                <div class='block_label'>
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                                  #{show_element_name(e)}
        
      46. 
      
        
    46.

      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                                <div class='block_link'>
        
      48. 
      
        
    48.

      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                                </div>
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                              </li>"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    generate_activity_element_tree(e, tree)
        
      53.

            def generate_wbs_project_elt_tree(element, tree, show_hidden=false)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              #Root is always display
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              tree ||= String.new
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              unless element.nil?

    65. 
          
          
                if element.is_root?

      67.

                             <li style='margin-left:-1em;'>
        
      68. 
      
        
    68.

      73. 
      
        
    73.

      74.

            def show_element_name(element)
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
              if element.attributes.has_key? "record_status_id"
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                if element.is_root?
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  "<span class='#{ element.record_status.to_s }'>Root element - #{element.name} </span>"
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                else
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  "<span class='#{ element.record_status.to_s }'> #{element.name} </span>"
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              else
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                if element.is_root?
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  #"<span class=''>#{element.pe_wbs_project.name} WBS-Activity</span>"
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  "<span class=''>#{@project.title} WBS-Activity : Activity breakdown Structure </span>"
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                else
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  "<span class=''> #{element.name} </span>"
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
            def link_activity_element(element)
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              res = String.new
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              if element.attributes.has_key? "record_status_id"
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                res << link_to( '', new_wbs_activity_element_path(:selected_parent_id => element.id, :activity_id => element.wbs_activity_id), :class => "icon-plus icon-large")
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                res << link_to( '', edit_wbs_activity_element_path(element, :activity_id => element.wbs_activity_id), :class => "icon-edit icon-large", :title => "Edit", :confirm => (I18n.t(:text_master_force_edit) if element.is_defined?) )
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                res << link_to( '', element, confirm: 'Are you sure?', method: :delete, :class => "icon-trash icon-large", :title => "Delete")
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                unless enable_update_in_local?
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  res = link_to('', wbs_activity_element_path(element, :activity_id => element.wbs_activity_id), method: :get, :class => "icon-eye-open icon-large", :title => "Show", :remote => true)
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              else
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                res << link_to_unless(element.is_from_library_and_is_leaf?, '', new_wbs_project_element_path(:selected_parent_id => element.id, :project_id => @project.id), :class => "icon-plus icon-large", :title => "New")
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                res << link_to_unless(element.is_root?, '', edit_wbs_project_element_path(element, :project_id => @project.id), :class => 'bl edit', :title => "Edit")
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                res << link_to_unless(element.is_root?,  '', wbs_project_element_path(element, :project_id => @project.id), confirm: 'Are you sure?', method: :delete, :project_id => @project.id, :class => "icon-trash icon-large", :title => "Delete") unless  !element.destroy_leaf
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                res << link_to_if(element.is_added_wbs_root,  '', "wbs_project_elements/#{element.id}/change_wbs_project_ratio", :wbs_project_element_id => element.id,  :project_id => @project.id, :class => "icon-share icon-large", :title => "Change Ratio", :remote => true)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              res
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
            end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          end

            def forgotten_password(user)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          16
          
              @user = user
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          16
          
              I18n.locale = user.locale
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          16
          
              mail(:to => @user.email, :subject => I18n.t(:mail_subject_lost_password))
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            ensure
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          16
          
              reset_locale
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
            end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35.

      91.

          16
          
              I18n.locale = user.locale
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          16
          
              mail(:to => @user.email, :subject => I18n.t(:mail_subject_account_created))
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
            ensure
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          16
          
              reset_locale
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
            end
        
      96.

      97.

          1
          
          class Attribute < ActiveRecord::Base
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
            include MasterDataHelper  #Module master data management (UUID generation, deep clone, ...)

    26.

          1

          1

          1
          
            has_many :pemodules, :through => :attribute_modules
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :record_status
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :owner_of_change, :class_name => "User", :foreign_key => "owner_id"

    34.

    35. 
          1

      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
            validates :uuid, :presence => true, :uniqueness => { :case_sensitive => false }
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
            validates :name, :alias, :presence => true,  :uniqueness => { :scope => :record_status_id, :case_sensitive => false }
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
            validates :custom_value, :presence => true, :if => :is_custom?
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            ##Enable the amoeba gem for deep copy/clone (dup with associations)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
            amoeba do
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
              enable
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
              exclude_field [:attribute_modules]
