      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
              self.groups.select{ |i| i.for_project_security ==  true }
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
            end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
             # Allow to encrypt password
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
            def encrypt_password
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          75
          
              if password.present?
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          62
          
                self.password_salt = BCrypt::Engine.generate_salt
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          62
          
                self.password_hash = BCrypt::Engine.hash_secret(password, password_salt)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
            end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
            # Allow to identify the user before the connection.
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
            def self.authenticate(login, password)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              #login can be login_name or email
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          3
          
              user = User.find(:first, :conditions => ["login_name = ? OR email = ?", login, login ])
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
              #if a user is found
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          3
          
              if user
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          3
          
                if user.auth_method.name != "Application"
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                    user.ldap_authentication(password, login)
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  rescue
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    nil
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                else
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          3
          
                  if user.password_hash == BCrypt::Engine.hash_secret(password, user.password_salt) && user.active?
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                    user
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                  else
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                    nil
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                  end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              else
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                nil
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
            end
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
            def ldap_authentication(password, login)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              self.auth_method.certificate ? use_ssl=:simple_tls : ''
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              ldap_cn = Net::LDAP.new(:host => self.auth_method.server_name,
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                                 :base => self.auth_method.base_dn,
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                                 :port => self.auth_method.port.to_i,
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                                 :encryption => use_ssl,
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                                 :auth => {
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                                     :method => :simple,
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                                     :username => "#{self.auth_method.user_name_attribute.to_s}=#{self.login_name.to_s},#{self.auth_method.base_dn}",
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                                     :password => password
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                                 })
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              if ldap_cn.bind
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                if self.active?
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                  self
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                else
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                  nil
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                end
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
              else
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                nil
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
            end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
            #Check if password is present
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
            def password_present?
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
              !password.blank?
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
            end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
            #Override
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
            def to_s
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
              self.name
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
            end
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
          
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
            # Returns "Firtname Name"
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
            def name
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          234
          
              self.first_name + " " + self.last_name
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
            end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
            #Send email in order to reset user password
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
            def send_password_reset
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
              generate_token(:password_reset_token)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              self.password_reset_sent_at = Time.zone.now
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
              self.save(:validate => false)
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
              UserMailer.forgotten_password(self).deliver
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
            end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
            #Generate a token field
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          1
          
            def generate_token(column)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
              begin
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          112
          
                self[column] = SecureRandom.urlsafe_base64
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          112
          
              end while User.exists?(column => self[column])
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
            end
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
          
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
            #Search on first_name, last_name, email, login_name fields.
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
            def self.table_search(search)
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
              if search
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1
          
                where('first_name LIKE ? or last_name LIKE ? or email LIKE ? or login_name LIKE ? or user_status LIKE ?', "%#{search}%","%#{search}%", "%#{search}%", "%#{search}%", "%#{search}%" )
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
              else
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                scoped
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
              end
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
            end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
            #return the ten latest project
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
            #TODO: change name of field. Use latest_project instead of ten_latest_project
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
            def latest_project
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              self.ten_latest_projects
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
            end
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
          
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
            #Load user project securioties for selected project id
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          1
          
            def project_securities_for_select(prj_id)
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
              self.project_securities.select{ |i| i.project_id == prj_id }.first
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
            end
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
          
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
            #Add in the list of latest project a new project
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          1
          
            def add_recent_project(project_id)
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
              val = self.ten_latest_projects.delete(project_id.to_i)
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
              if val
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                self.ten_latest_projects.insert(0, val.to_i)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
              else
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          1
          
                self.ten_latest_projects.insert(0, project_id.to_i)
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
              end
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
              self.save
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            end
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
          
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
            #Delete in the list of latest project a new project
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          1
          
            def delete_recent_project(project_id)
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
              self.ten_latest_projects.delete(project_id.to_i) if self.ten_latest_projects.include?(project_id.to_i)
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
              self.save
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
            end
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
          
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
            #List of Admin group
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
            def admin_groups
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          2
          
              Group.find_all_by_name(["Admin", "MasterAdmin"])
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
            end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          1
          
            def tz
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          2
          
              self.time_zone.nil? ? "UTC" : self.time_zone
        
      264.

            def self.build_ancestry(elements, activity_id)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
              elements.each do |elt|
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          44
          
                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          44
          
                  hierarchy = elt.dotted_id
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          44
          
                  ancestors = []
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          44
          
                  @root_element = WbsActivityElement.find_by_dotted_id_and_wbs_activity_id("0", activity_id)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          44
          
                  unless hierarchy == "0" or hierarchy.nil?
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          43
          
                    idse = hierarchy.split(/^(.*)\.[^\.]*.$/).last
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          43
          
                    if idse == hierarchy
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          5
          
                      if @root_element
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          5
          
                        elt.ancestry = @root_element.id
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                      end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                    else
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          38
          
                      pere = WbsActivityElement.find_by_dotted_id_and_wbs_activity_id(idse, activity_id)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          38
          
                      unless pere.nil?
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                        ancestors << pere.ancestry
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                        ancestors << pere.id
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                      end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          38
          
                      elt.ancestry = ancestors.join('/')
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                    end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          43
          
                    elt.save(:validate => false)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                  end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116.

      117.

            def self.rebuild(elements, activity_id)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
              elements.each do |elt|
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          2

      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          2
          
                pere = WbsActivityElement.find_by_wbs_activity_id(activity_id)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          2
          
                unless pere.nil?
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          2
          
                  ancestors << pere.ancestry
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          2
          
                  ancestors << pere.id
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          2
          
                elt.ancestry = ancestors.join('/')
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          2
          
                elt.save(:validate => false)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              end

            def self.export(activity_ratio_id)

          1
          
            def self.import(file, sep, encoding)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
              sep = "#{sep.blank? ? I18n.t(:general_csv_separator) : sep}"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
              error_count = 0
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
              CSV.open(file.path, "r", :quote_char => "\"", :row_sep => :auto, :col_sep => sep, :encoding => "#{encoding}:utf-8") do |csv|
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                csv.each_with_index do |row, i|
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          44
          
                  unless row.empty? or i == 0
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          43
          
                    begin
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          43
          
                      @ware = WbsActivityRatioElement.find(row[0])
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          2
          
                      @ware.wbs_activity_element.has_children?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          2
          
                      @ware.update_attribute("ratio_value", row[5])
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          2
          
                      @ware.update_attribute("simple_reference", row[6])
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          2
          
                      @ware.update_attribute("multiple_references", row[7])
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    rescue
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          41
          
                      error_count = error_count + 1
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                  end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                end
        
      66.

            def self.arrange_as_array(options={}, hash=nil)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              hash ||= arrange(options)

    37.

    38. 
          
          
              arr = []

              hash.each do |node, children|
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                arr << node
        
      41.

                arr += arrange_as_array(options, children) unless children.empty?

    42.

            def before_destroy(module_project)

            def after_update(user)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          19
          
              if user.user_status_changed?
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          3
          
                if user.suspended? || user.pending? || user.blacklisted?
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          2
          
                  UserMailer.account_suspended(user).deliver
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                else
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
                  if user.password.blank?
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    if user.auth_method.name == "Application"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                      UserMailer.account_validate(user).deliver
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    else
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                      UserMailer.account_validate_ldap(user).deliver
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                    end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  else
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1

      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  end
        
      38.

      39.

          1
          
            def validate_change
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              #get the record controller name
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              controller = params[:controller]    #controller.controller_name
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              record_class_name = controller.classify  #controller.singularize.capitalize
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              #TODO: Define authorization for master data validation
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              #authorize! :"edit_#{record_class_name.downcase.pluralize}", "#{record_class_name.constantize}"
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              begin
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                #Get the record to validate from its ID
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                @record = record_class_name.constantize.find(params[:id])
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                trans_successful = false
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                #Temporally save uuid
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                temp_current_uuid = @record.uuid
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                parent_record = @record.parent_reference
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                #If record parent is nil (for new created record)...only status is going to change
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                if parent_record.nil?
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                  @record.record_status = @defined_status
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  if @record.save
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    flash[:notice] = I18n.t(:notice_master_data_successful_validated)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    flash[:error] = I18n.l(error_master_data_failed_validate, value => @record.errors.full_messages.to_sentence)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                else
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  temp_parent_uuid = parent_record.uuid
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  #Create transaction to avoid uuid duplication error in DB
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  parent_record.transaction do
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    @record.uuid = UUIDTools::UUID.random_create.to_s
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                    parent_record.record_status = @retired_status
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    parent_record.uuid = temp_current_uuid
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    parent_record.reference_uuid = @record.reference_uuid
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    @record.save!
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    parent_record.save!
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    trans_successful = true
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                  end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  if trans_successful
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                    @record.reference_uuid = nil
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    @record.uuid = temp_parent_uuid
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    @record.record_status = @defined_status
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                    if @record.save
        
      67.

      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    else
        
      69. 
      
        
    69.

      70.

                    end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                end
        
      73.

      74.

                redirect_to :back and return
        
      75.

      76.

              rescue ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid => error
        
      77.

    101.

          require "rubygems"

          1
          
          require "uuidtools"

      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
          module MasterDataHelper
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            def self.included(base)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              base.class_eval do
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                #self relation on master data : Parent<->Child
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                has_one    :child_reference,  :class_name => "#{base}", :inverse_of => :parent_reference, :foreign_key => "reference_id"
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                belongs_to :parent_reference, :class_name => "#{base}", :inverse_of => :child_reference,  :foreign_key => "reference_id"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                #UUID generation on create
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                #TODO: validate uuid format and length in model
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                before_validation(:on => :create) do
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                  self.uuid = UUIDTools::UUID.random_create.to_s   #generate uuid like: 4f844456-42bb-11e2-bebb-d4bed96c8c48"
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                #scope for find methods
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                scope :by_uuid, lambda {|uuid| where("uuid = ?", uuid) }
        
      22. 
      
        
    22.

                #Allow to show or not the record custom value (only if record_status = Custom) on List
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                def show_custom_value
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                  #if self.is_custom? || self.is_local_record?
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  unless self.is_local_record?
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                    self.custom_value.blank? ? "" : "( #{self.custom_value} ) "
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              #Show record status collection list according to current_user permission
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              def record_status_collection
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                @record_statuses = RecordStatus.all
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                begin
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                  if self.new_record?
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                    if defined?(MASTER_DATA) and MASTER_DATA and File.exists?("#{Rails.root}/config/initializers/master_data.rb")
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                      @record_statuses = RecordStatus.where("name = ?", "Proposed")
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                    else
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                      @record_statuses = RecordStatus.where("name = ?", "Local")
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                    end
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                  else
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                    @record_statuses = RecordStatus.where("name <> ?", "Defined")
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                  end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                rescue
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                  []
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              end
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end #END self.included
        
      178.

    179. 
          
          
          end

    lib/pe_wbs_helper.rb

    16.67 % covered

          module PeWbsHelper

            def self.included(base)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          
        
      5.

              base.class_eval do
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                helper_method :current_user_wbs_activities
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                #Show all WBS-Activities of all current_user Organizations
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                def current_user_wbs_activities
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                    user_wbs_activities_collection = []
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                    current_user_organizations = current_user.organizations.all
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                    current_user_organizations.each do |organization|
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                      user_wbs_activities_collection = user_wbs_activities_collection + organization.wbs_activities
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                    end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    user_wbs_activities_collection.uniq
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  rescue
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    user_wbs_activities_collection
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          end
        
      26.
